task.prompt: For some complex number $\omega$ with $|\omega| = 2,$ there is some real $\lambda > 1$ such that $\omega,$ $\omega^2,$ and $\lambda \omega$ form an equilateral triangle in the complex plane.  Find $\lambda.$
